benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: GET /1.0/kb/invoicePayments/{paymentId}/tags - Retrieve payment tags

covered: Valid Request: Happy path and multiple success cases return 200 with application/json and a JSON array of Tag objects.
Empty Response: Invoice payment with no tags returns 200 and an empty array; not-found cases return 404.
Path Parameter Validation: Invalid UUID format returns 400; non-existent paymentId returns 404.

Query Parameters: includedDeleted default (false) and true are exercised; pluginProperty with multi values; audit=FULL and MINIMAL; combined param scenario; invalid audit value -> 400; extra params ignored.
Security Hardening: SQL injection in paymentId and XSS in pluginProperty covered without leaking sensitive info.
Resiliency/Errors: 500 Internal Server Error and 503 dependency failure; transient failure with retry; regression test for includedDeleted behavior.
Performance/Volume: Large number of tags and heavy-load scenario validate non-truncation and acceptable response time.
Backward compatibility and basic accessibility considerations are included.
gaps: Authorization: No test for insufficient permissions/roles returning 403; only missing token (401) is covered.
Caching Behavior: No checks for ETag/Last-Modified, Cache-Control headers, or conditional GET leading to 304 Not Modified.
Rate Limiting/Throttling: No scenarios for burst traffic returning 429 with Retry-After.
Audit Parameter NONE: No explicit test asserting absence of audit fields when audit=NONE or by default.
Schema Validation: No JSON schema validation of Tag objects (e.g., tagDefinitionId/name, objectType/objectId, createdDate) or of error payload structure for 4xx/5xx.

Query Param Robustness: No test for invalid boolean (e.g., includedDeleted=foo) -> 400; no case-sensitivity test for audit values; no URL-encoding/special character coverage for pluginProperty beyond XSS.
PluginProperty Limits: Upper-bound negative case (N+1 entries) and expected error not covered; deduplication/ordering behavior not verified.
Content Negotiation: No tests for Accept header behavior (application/json, unsupported types -> 406) or charset in Content-Type.
Pagination: Not specified in the story; if unsupported, add a clarifying test/assertion. If supported, limit/offset and next-page headers are not tested.
recommendations: Add authorization tests for a valid token without required permissions returning 403, differentiating clearly from 401.
Add caching tests: assert ETag/Cache-Control headers on 200; perform conditional GET with If-None-Match/If-Modified-Since and expect 304 when appropriate.
Introduce rate limiting tests: send rapid bursts to trigger 429 Too Many Requests and verify Retry-After/backoff behavior.
Add audit=NONE test and, in the default (no audit param) case, assert that audit fields are absent.
Incorporate JSON schema validation for Tag and for error responses (400/404/500/503) to ensure contract compliance.
Expand query param robustness: invalid boolean for includedDeleted -> 400; audit value case sensitivity; URL-encoded and special characters in pluginProperty.
Test pluginProperty over the documented maximum (N+1) to confirm proper error handling (e.g., 400) and define expected behavior for duplicates/order.
Add content negotiation tests: Accept: application/json succeeds; unsupported Accept returns 406; verify response Content-Type includes charset if required.
Clarify pagination support for this endpoint. If not supported, add a test asserting no pagination headers are present; if supported, add limit/offset and large-list navigation tests.
Optionally, add method-negatives (e.g., POST/PUT/DELETE -> 405) to strengthen contract testing, if enforced by the service.
